name: de-kannada-rajyotsava-tournament
description: Flutter web application for DE Kannada Rajyotsava Badminton Tournament 2025

scripts.build-direct: curl -L https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.24.3-stable.tar.xz -o flutter.tar.xz && tar xf flutter.tar.xz && export PATH="$PATH:$PWD/flutter/bin" && flutter config --enable-web && cd flutter_web && flutter pub get && flutter build web --release --web-renderer html
scripts.start: echo 'This is a Flutter web app. Use npm run build to build for production.'
scripts.postbuild: echo 'Flutter web build completed. Files are in flutter_web/build/web/'
scripts.test: echo 'No tests specified for Flutter web build process'

author: vrsimha-sys
